trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Watchingway has a mystery in want of solving.

TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_WATCHINGWAY_000_000<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>─have you by chance seen any thieves prowling about with ill-gotten iron carrots? They're crimson, tender, surprisingly heavy...the carrots, that is, not the thieves.

TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_WATCHINGWAY_000_001<tab>If you haven't seen them yet, I'm sure you will! We've been told that you “adventurers” are quite good at solving crimes that no one else can be bothered with.
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_WATCHINGWAY_000_002<tab>Wonderful! I'm relying on you to solve our carrot caper. Honestly, what manner of fiend would deny a Loporrit their dinner...

TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_WATCHINGWAY_000_003<tab>Ahem. Anyway, our culprit─or culprits─took four carrots in all. Those are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> easy to carry about, so I daresay they can't have gotten far!
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_WATCHINGWAY_000_004<tab>There must be a clue around here somewhere...
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>This scrumptious-looking iron carrot has been tragically abandoned in its prime.
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_SUPPORTER04240_000_010<tab><blip> <blip> Insufficient stock of iron carrots... Iron carrot detected. Initiating iron carrot procurement!
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Based on the primer you but recently received, you can say with relative certainty that iron carrots are not blue...
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_LOPORRITS04240_000_030<tab><munch> <munch>...<gulp> Mmm! These philosopher's carrots really hit the spot! Just a few more... Wha─!?
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_LOPORRITS04240_000_031<tab>What? No, of course I'm not stealing! These are mine. Is it so wrong to enjoy an early dinner?
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>The muttering Loporrit stomps off in search of a place to eat in peace. You suspect this is not your carrot culprit.
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_WATCHINGWAY_000_040<tab>You're back! Please tell me you found the carrots.
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_WATCHINGWAY_000_042<tab>The supporter? I never would have suspected... It's supposed to help us farm carrots, not eat them!

TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_WATCHINGWAY_000_043<tab>Hmm... I recall the technicians said something about enhancing its code with a love for carrots to increase work efficiency. But to go so far as to steal carrots for itself, I fear it may now love them a little <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> much...
TEXT_AKTKZE001_04240_WATCHINGWAY_000_044<tab>Alas, those poor carrots! But at least we know what became of them, and how to prevent this happening again. Thank you for your assistance!
